title: How do I stop tdhis error message appearing and stopping me send an email?
content:
I frequently send out an email to two groups of people, BCCing all the recipients.

The email to the first group always goes smoothly. The identical email to the second group doesn't always.

Today, I sent the group one email and it went just fine. Then I tried to send a second and got this message: "Send Message Erro. "Sending of the message failed. "An error occurred while sending mail. The mail server responded: Error sending message for delivery. Please check the message and try again."

The message does have a.png attachment but it went just fine when I sent it to the other group. Any thoughts, anyone?
creator: rogercorke

title: Não consigo enviar e-mail com cópia para mim mesma.
content:
Tenho mais de um e-mail. Apenas no que eu utilizo mais ('''mcglp--@--com''') não consigo enviar cópia para mim mesma.

mcglp--@--com e mcpe--@--com

Tento enviar ou responder via mcglp--@--com com cópia para mcglp--@--com

Recebo a mensagem abaixo e nem entendo o mcpe--@--com aparece no erro.

Falha ao enviar mensagem. Ocorreu um erro ao enviar email. O servidor de email respondeu: <mcglp--@--com>: Sender address rejected: not owned by user mcpe--@--com Verifique o destinatário da mensagem "mcglp--@--com" e tente novamente.
creator: mcglpedroso

title: Grouped threads with new messages are not highlighted
content:
I am using Thunderbird 115.2.0 (64-bit) on Mac OS Ventura 13.5.1 (22G90).

I am using threaded conversations (View -> Sort by -> Threaded).

The problem I have is that threads with new messages are not highlighted. When I see that I have unread messages, I need to click too many times just to detect the threads with unread messages. Other clients simply highlights threads with unread messages.

Is there any way to have bold (highlighted) threaded messages when they contain unread emails?
creator: lordthistle

El mensaje se enviará utilizando el remitente actual y la configuración de la identidad de nombredeusuario" ¿Cómo puedo deshacer todo esto, volver a enviar emails, reenviar y que deje de aparecerme esa alerta de identidad del remitente?

title: website email link takes me to talktalk web mail not thunderbird client
content:
When I clicked a link on a website I used to be taken to an option to select email client (in my case Thunderbird). Now on chromium or Firefox I get sent to Talktalk web mail (yes I use Talktalk) interface. Useless if I want to have a local copy of the sent email. This change was noticed after Talktalk "updated their webmail system recently. Not sure if this change has "corrupted" the settings in both browsers in the assumption that we all use webmail - clearly somewhere they have noted which email service I use. As some my have noted finding the winning lottery number is easier than getting hold of a useful person at Talktalk

Suggestions welcome. Chromium 116.0.5845.140 Thunderbird 91.11.0 Ubuntu 20.04.6

Ralph Taylor
creator: ralph.g.taylor

title: Read/Unread Rollback?
content:
I use read/unread status of emails to manage both my inbox and my overall workload. I had around 20 important emails from the last year marked as unread - this morning the whole inbox is 'read'. I've lost my marked emails - well, the mark, not the email - and I'm up the creek.

Is there any way 'roll back' to an earlier state? I've tried 'undo' to no avail. I have access to the server if that means anything.

title: How do I stop Thunderbird from asking for an email account?
content: I only use Thunderbird for its local Calendar and don't need to communicate with anyone using the app. Every time it starts up it pops up a dialog asking me to set up an email which I do not need for my Calendar. This dialog actually blocks the Calendar from loading so I have to dismiss it every time.
creator: cyaugin

title: Difficulty bulk printing End to End Encrypted Messages
content:
Hello!

I'm attempting to help a family member who uses software that a recent update decided it wanted to end-to-end encrypt the messages it sends to the workfloor. This isn't itself a problem. Everything there works fine.

HOWEVER. The workers are accustomed to printing the emails to use as physical checklists and while printing an individual message works fine, if they select a batch of them to print, they aren't decrypted before being printed ( IE, they get a nice --- BEGIN PGP.... block on the paper ) and that's... suboptimal.

I rather imagine this isn't configurable anywhere I'm asking in case it somehow is.

Thanks!
creator: dbolack

title: Thunderbird non trova la rete Google Talk
content: Su Thunderbird (versione 102.15.0 a 64 bit) non riesco a configurare la chat relativa alla rete Google Talk perché il programma non la trova, la "configurazione automatica account chat" mi propone solo le reti IRC, Matrix, Odnoklassniki, XMPP. Non mi trova Google Talk anche se io ho 4 account tutti di Gmail, tutti perfettamente funzionanti come mail, tutti con IMAP attivo, chat attiva. Ho provato a cambiare e verificare tutte il opzioni sia sulle impostazioni degli account di Google sia su Thunderbird ma non riesco a capire dove sia il problema. Grazie.

title: Why no 'Empty Folder' option for Unified Junk and Unified Trash folders?
content: Recently migrating from a MS mail client to Thunderbird, I'm used to working exclusively with what T'bird calls Unified Folders, rarely using the All Folders view. Junk and Trash can be deleted in their respective Unified Folders by doing a CTRL+A and the Delete key, but it makes me a bit nervous as this action could inadvertently be applied to the Unified Inbox or Sent folders as well. But a right-click and selection of Empty Folder at least makes one stop and think. I do miss the "Are you sure..." warnings that MS optionally provided; I wonder if there is an add-on that might provide that?
creator: Electrojim

title: Thunderbird me dobla los correos enviados
content:
Buenas he configurado mi cuenta de Hotmail(Outlook) al Thunderbird...y se me han puesto todas las carpetas y correos como veo cuando entro al correo, bien.

Cada vez que envio un 1 correo con Thunderbird se me dobla el correo cuando se pone a "correos enviados" y lo mismo veo cuando entro al correo por web... Si envio los correos por la web no me ocurre este problema solo al enviar correos desde el programa Thunderbird. Añadí la cuenta por defecto y no toque nada especial en la configuración. Gracias

title: E-mail folders not showing correct counts of unread and new mail
content:
In Thunderbird 115.2.0 (64-bit) (W11 Home), new mail counts and/or total unread message counts not showing until folders/accounts expanded.

For example account "A" has only an inbox and does not show any unread messages. But when you expand the account, suddenly there will be multiple unread e-mails and when you collapse the account it will show the correct count.

This will also apply to accounts that have multiple folders that have sorting rules. This has just started, and it is a new computer.

title: changing font styles and adding inline images while composing messages
content:
Hi. I use TB 115 on Mac OS11. I have composition settings set to allow HTML as needed. I seek to add inline (not attached) photos, as well as to change some composed text to bold or italic. There are no such options within my TB menu, despite my having read many, many suggestions within the community forum that such are available. Ideally, I would see options such as are described here:

https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/new-thunderbird-91#w_new-user-interface-for-adding-attachments

and immediately scrolled down from there, which speaks of a font menu. When I drag an image to TB's composition, I receive only an attachment option--one rectangle--not two rectangles of options. And there is no means to bold or italic a word. Please advise.

Many thanks!

Tony
